a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Trade as a share of GDP, 1960 to 2023
Sum of exports and imports of goods and services, divided by gross domestic product, expressed as a
percentage. This is also known as the "trade openness index".
Data source: World Bank and OECD national accounts (2025)
